detectors.description:
BoostVaultRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#702-726) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardAmount = reward.mul(TREASURY_FEE).div(DENOM) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#713)
	-currentEpoch.rewardPerToken = currentEpoch.rewardPerToken.add(rewardAmount.mul(PRECISION).div(boostedTotalSupply)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#720-724)

	-[currentEpoch.rewardPerToken = currentEpoch.rewardPerToken.add(rewardAmount.mul(PRECISION).div(boostedTotalSupply))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#L720-L724)

detectors.description:

		- want.safeTransfer(user,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#841)

		- nextBoostPurchaseTime[user] = block.timestamp.add(3600) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BoostVaultRewards__1.sol#856)
